Detailed Description

template<class T>
class ipl::CPositionGroup2DConstIterator< T >

Iterator class to access data from the class CPositionGroup2D, last updated 1/25/2002.

This class is not complete, only a few operators are overloaded. But it can be used as a basic iterator where the iterator is incremented with the ++ operator or decremented with the -- operator.

This class is part of the Image Processing Library IPL98.

See also:
CPositionGroup2DIterator , CPositionGroup2D
Version:
0.20, by edr@mip.sdu.dk
Author:
René Dencker Eriksen
